name: nonchemical
content:

Add to word list
not involving chemicals or chemistry: There are several nonchemical remedies which can help you to get a good night's sleep. The company has developed a range of non-chemical weed-killers.
More examplesFewer examplesThey have tried various nonchemical methods for getting rid of the slugs in their garden.I applied a non-chemical treatment to the lawn.I am trying to use non-chemical treatments to manage my skin condition.Traditional Chinese medicine uses non-chemical treatments such as massage and acupuncture.
